title: Birth of a novel
author: VD
content_html: I’m pleased to let you all know that Marcher Lord Press has announced the forthcoming publication of my next novel, Summa Elvetica: A Casuistry of the Elvish Controversy. It’s a fantasy novel and if you’d like to read more about it, the publisher has posted an interview as well as a sample chapter at the above link. I have to admit, I haven’t been this pleased with a cover since Rowena completed her painting of Kaym and Mariel.
